# Corruption (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Demon Lords***:** | Demogorgon, Ghaunadaur, Juiblex, Pale Night, [[The Patient One\|the Patient One]] |
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** Once per day, you can attack an object and ignore its hardness.

**Corruption Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Doom (Spell)|Doom]]****:** One subject takes a –2 penalty on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.

**2** **[[Blindness_Deafness (Spell)|Blindness/Deafness]]****:** Makes subject [[Blinded|blinded]] or [[Deafened|deafened]].

**3** **[[Contagion (Spell)|Contagion]]****:** Infects subject with chosen disease.

**4** **[[Morality Undone (Spell)|Morality Undone]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Subject becomes evil.

**5** **[[Feeblemind (Spell)|Feeblemind]]****:** Subject’s Int and Cha drop to 1.

**6** **[[Pox (Spell)|Pox]]****:** One creature/level takes 1d4 Con drain.

**7** **[[Insanity (Spell)|Insanity]]****:** Subject affected by continuous confusion.

**8** **[[Befoul (Spell)|Befoul]]****:** Turns large amount of water poisonous.

**9** **[[Despoil (Spell)|Despoil]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Kills plants and damages objects in 100-ft./level radius.


| **Source:** | Lords of Madness (WotC), pg. 207 |
|---|---|
| | Book of Vile Darkness (WotC), pg. 80 |
| | Fiendish Codex I (WotC), pg. 88 |
